greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table T(n,k) of the number of n X k matrices on {0,1} without adjacent 0's in any row or column.
comment: Recurrence orders are A089935. n X 1/1 X n patterns interpreted as binary values is A003714.
Number of independent vertex sets in the P_n X P_k grid graph. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Jun 06 2017
All columns (or rows) are linear recurrences with constant coefficients and order of the recurrence <= A001224(k+1). - _Andrew Howroyd_, Dec 24 2019
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1225
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Grid Graph
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Independent Vertex Set
program: step(v, S)={vector(#v, i, sum(j=1, #v, v[j]*!bitand(S[i], S[j])))}
T(n,k)={my(S=mkS(k), v=vector(#S, i, i==1)); for(n=1, n, v=step(v,S)); vecsum(v)} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Dec 24 2019
xref: T(n, 0) = T(0, m) = 1. Zero based table is A089980.
Cf. A089935, A001224, A197054 (maximal independent sets), A218354, A003714.
results.author: _Marc LeBrun_, Nov 15 2003
